properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 16 at 1:25AM CST until February 17 at 1:22PM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the
following rivers in Middle Tennessee...

Duck River At Centerville affecting Hickman County

.The Duck River At Centerville affecting Hickman County will continue
falling and looks to fall below action stage during afternoon hours on
Monday, February 17th.

The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Duck River At Centerville
* At 01AM Sunday the stage was 21.9 feet.
* Action stage is 17.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 22.0 feet.
* The river will continue to fall to near 18.0 feet by tomorrow morning.
* At 17.0 feet...Water begins to overflow the banks.
properties.instruction:
Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio or other local media for further
information from the National Weather Service.
